You tell Rah that you two need to keep listening to the radio. Rah seems stressed, but you are able to calm them down. You don't like this either. You watch Rah tinker with the radio until it's dark outside. As Rah is working, a blue light flahses into the room from outside the window.

You and Rah get up and look out the window. You two see a crowd gathering around the colorful light source, coming from the docks.
